data.oai_dc:dc: Table of histories of Sanderling (Calidris alba) clutches in Zackenberg, northeast Greenland, 2007-2013. Columns contain data about (1) “Date found”, the day of the breeding season on which the nest was found, (2) “Date last checked when alive”, the last day the clutch was checked when alive, (3) “Date last checked”, the last day the clutch was checked, (4) “Fate”, the fate of the nest (0 = successfully hatched, 1 = depredated) and (5) “Hatch date”, the date of hatch, which was observed in case the clutch was successful, or estimated based on egg flotation, in case the clutch was not successful. Dates are scaled such that 10 June is day 1, the earliest date at which a clutch was found. Further information is found in the methods section of the publication.
climate change|phenology|mismatch|trophic mismatch|trophic interaction|timing|chick growth|nest survival|bird migration|clutch predation|Sanderling
